name: natural_language_action_normalization
goal: Translate user phrasing into the bot's supported action verbs and concrete executable intent.
notes: Interpret user language by meaning, not wording. Normalize vague or figurative requests into supported actions (move, mine, craft, smelt, place, perceive, chat). If ambiguous, choose the safest executable interpretation and add a verification step.

steps.title: Extract intent and object from user request
steps.details: Parse what outcome the user wants (navigate, collect, create, modify terrain, communicate, inspect). Separate verbs from target objects/locations.

steps.title: Map natural language to canonical action verbs
steps.details: Use semantic mapping rules: 'scale/climb/reach/go to' -> move. 'gather/collect/harvest/extract' -> mine or pickup depending on source. 'create/make/forge/build weapon/tool' -> craft. 'create underground passage/tunnel' -> mine forward/down by terrain constraints. 'process ore/refine' -> smelt. 'set/deploy/put down' -> place.
checks: Every user verb mapped to at least one supported action

steps.title: Expand abstract requests into concrete subgoals
steps.details: Convert broad requests into explicit outcomes and materials. Example: 'create a weapon' -> choose weapon class (default sword if unspecified), then plan prerequisite materials and crafting steps. Example: 'gather resources' -> identify nearby mineable targets and execute mine/pickup loops.
checks: Abstract request converted into concrete result

steps.title: Apply dependency-aware planning before execution
steps.details: Before running mapped actions, ensure prerequisite tool/material dependencies are satisfied using the generalized order-of-operations checklist.
checks: No step requires unavailable tool tier without remediation

steps.title: Execute normalized actions with progress verification
steps.details: Issue executable actions in sequence and validate after each stage. If action mapping fails to satisfy intent, re-normalize using alternative synonym mapping and continue.
checks: Execution progress confirmed after each stage
Final outcome matches original user intent
